svg.desc: [Characters |Dominant Hand: (Yes/No);(Not really needed in Version 1) |[Mana|Mana - Mana Cost] [Mana Cost |Spell Name: (Insert Name) |Attribute: (Insert Attribute) |Mana Cost: (Base or Attribute Mana Cost) ] [Attribute] [Insert Character's Attribute] [Weapon Only Users] [Attribute]->[Insert Character's Attribute] [Attribute] -> [Weapon Only Users] [Willpower Boost|(Default 25%)] [Attribute Mana Cost |Same Attribute: Only 5% mana drain + 25% energy boost per spell |2nd Attribute: Base +10% mana drain + 5% energy boost per spell |3rd Attribute: Base +15% mana drain + 5% boost |Opposite Attribute: Base +50% mana drain + 0% energy boost (because Fire > Wind) ] [Base Mana Cost|Spell's Base Mana Cost only;(For Weapon Only Users, Mana Cost is Default Spell Mana Cost.)] [Mana] -> [Mana Cost] [Mana Cost] -> Weapons Only User [Base Mana Cost] [Mana Cost] -> Magic User[Attribute Mana Cost] [List of Spells|Insert List of Spells] [Fire] [Water] [Earth] [Wind] [Attribute Mana Cost]<:- [Fire] [Attribute Mana Cost]<:- [Water] [Attribute Mana Cost]<:- [Earth] [Attribute Mana Cost]<:- [Wind] [Base Mana Cost]<:- [List of Spells] [Attribute Mana Cost]<:- [List of Spells] [Willpower Boost] <:- [Attribute Mana Cost] [Attribute] <:- [Attribute Mana Cost] ]

g.text: Same Attribute: Only 5% mana drain + 25% energy boost per spell
2nd Attribute: Base +10% mana drain + 5% energy boost per spell
Opposite Attribute: Base +50% mana drain + 0% energy boost (because Fire > Wind)
Mana Cost: (Base or Attribute Mana Cost)
(For Weapon Only Users, Mana Cost is Default Spell Mana Cost.)
